to.sven.androidrccar.host.presentation

Class ConnectedActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • to.sven.androidrccar.host.presentation.AbstractHostActivity
        • to.sven.androidrccar.host.presentation.ConnectedActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IHostServiceListener

    public class ConnectedActivity
extends AbstractHostActivity
    This activity will shown, when the Host is connected to the accessory and to the other phone (ServiceState.CONNECTED).
    Author:
    sven

        protected void handleState(ServiceState state)
